arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Rayo Vallecano – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid are set to host Rayo Vallecano at the Riyadh Aur Metropolitano on Wednesday for their upcoming La Liga matchup. Diego Simeone’s side are eager to reverse their fortunes as the Madrid derby looms on the horizon.
